TopicTitle: Is it just me or is remotetech presently having issues? (Local Control on all probecores)

Articles.Content:
I'm using a setup with only one ground station and I was expecting to lose control of the craft as it lost sight of the hemisphere however that never happened, I'm maintaining full control.

 

I tested this with some seti-probe-parts probe cores and with a normal old probododododyne stayputnik + reflectron.

I'm seeing remotetechs antenna descriptions in the relevant parts, I tried to excise any mod which could be interfering and I'm presently just at a loss.

Just wanted to say I fixed it, and it was pretty much a matter of removing everything seti + porkjet part overhaul set edition.

I couldn't say which individual part did it but as they all seem to like to mess with remotetech I just dropped all of them to simplify my solution.

That it what I was going to say: it's not Remote Tech that had a problem, but an unholy interaction between remote tech and some other module. 

Thanks for the info. It helped me to reduce my scope of research!
